Content.Text:
<NAME_MOB_MINA>
I really like the color black. It's very slimming,
you know?

<NAME_MOB_MINA>
Ooh, look at it sparkle! Makes me feel happy just
staring at it...

<NAME_MOB_MINA>
What lovely decor. It really speaks to the spring
season! May I have one? ...Ha, gotcha! I don't
really want one. Thanks, though!

<NAME_MOB_MINA>
If I put this sparkling thing on display in my
house, is it going to stand out too much, or just
enough? I'll have to try it and see...

<NAME_MOB_MINA>
What a stylish lamp this is! I've never seen
anything like it before...

<NAME_MOB_MINA>
Sitting in such an opulent chair makes me feel
like a rich, powerful woman. Gaston, bring me
my slippers! Hee hee...

<NAME_MOB_MINA>
I should get into the shade beneath the parasol
and relax, before I'm stricken with sunburn.

<NAME_MOB_MINA>
What a gorgeous fountain! It's absolutely
perfect...like it was designed just for me!

<NAME_MOB_MINA>
I've never seen a lamp like this before... Is it
some sort of crystal?
<PAGE>
...Not that I've ever seen a crystal either, mind
you!

<NAME_MOB_MINA>
When I was young, I used to ride all over
creation in something just like this. Ah, those
were the days! ♪

<NAME_MOB_MINA>
Oh, what a perfect flower for my distinctive
sensibilities! ♪

<NAME_MOB_MINA>
What a lovely smell! This noble fragrance would
fit me like a glove. ♪

<NAME_MOB_MINA>
Nothing enhances a girl's femininity quite like a
pink rose, wouldn't you agree?

<NAME_MOB_MINA>
All these blooming white roses smell so lovely. I
can't get enough of that wonderful snuff!

<NAME_MOB_MINA>
Oh, my, there's nothing worthwhile to buy here!

<NAME_MOB_MINA>
I bought quite a lot! You really should thank me.

<NAME_MOB_MINA>
If I tell other people that I bought something
made in this town, they always seem to get
jealous. Which is why I keep telling them!

<NAME_MOB_MINA>
I came here first today, for all my shopping
needs. And oh, the delightful treasures I found!

<NAME_MOB_MINA>
Please wait just a moment. I'm rather busy right
now.

<NAME_MOB_MINA>
Would I be able to get a discount, perchance?
Free would be ideal.

<NAME_MOB_MINA>
Oh, my! What a quaint little town this is!

<NAME_MOB_MINA>
I was planning to go to another town, but I got
on the wrong ship and wound up here!

<NAME_MOB_MINA>
I was planning to come here a while ago, but I
got on the wrong ship and went to another town
instead. Finally, though, I've retraced my steps!

<NAME_MOB_MINA>
Oh, my, what an impressively-sized town this is!
